titleStmt.title: Cantus, songs and fancies, to three, four, or five parts, both apt for voices and viols with a brief introduction to musick, as is taught by Thomas Davidson, in the Musick-School of Aberdene.
titleStmt.author: Davidson, Thomas, d. 1675.
Forbes, John, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: Wing attributed to Thomas Davidson who wrote the introduction.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
